HeroSection.title: Your digital recipe book
HeroSection.description: Store, organize, and easily find all your favorite recipes in one place. Now available for Android!

FeaturesSection.title: What we offer
FeaturesSection.feature1_description: App works offline on your device. Sign in optionally for cloud sync, AI features, and sharing.
FeaturesSection.feature3_description: Beautiful dark theme designed specifically for cooking in low-light environments and nighttime meal preparation.
FeaturesSection.feature4_description: Generate unique links to share your favorite recipes. Users can access the link from any device and the app will automatically open displaying the complete recipe with all ingredients and instructions.
FeaturesSection.feature5_description: Take a photo of any dish and our artificial intelligence will analyze the image to generate a complete recipe. The AI identifies visible ingredients and suggests preparation methods based on visual analysis of the dish.
FeaturesSection.feature6_description: The app is available in multiple languages including English, Spanish, French, German, and more to cater to users worldwide.

CTASection.title: Available now!
CTASection.description: The Recipes App is now available for Android. Download the app and start organizing your favorite recipes today.
